name: Techno BB
overview: Techno BB is a funky Playstation title which players much match up beats as represented by coloured tiles with the ultimate ambition of unleashing a Fever Chain. As it is with all good puzzlers, the gameplay allows players to get involved right away but has hidden and subtle complexities that appear on further inspection which its compulsive gameplay richly deserves. Game Modes: - Main Game: Clear all the bits in each level by making moves that makes the pieces to dissappear. When all are clear the game advance to the next stage. - Quiz: Solve the whole 6 levels each of them with 15 different puzzles that the game features in which the player only has 1 movement to solve the puzzle. - Time Limit: Solve the puzzle in a limited time
